characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: At the start of each turn, the Giant Chaos Spawn's mutable characteristics are reset, and the first time it is called upon to use, test, or roll for Movement, Strength, or Attacks, a new roll is made to determine that characteristic based on the number of Wounds the model currently possesses. That roll is then used for that characteristic until the end of the current turn, at which point it is once again reset.
